name: BillingConversation

examples.text: i think you took two payments from me
I think you took two payments out of my account
i want to know why you took a double payment from me
you guys took my payment twice
i think my payment was too high
i want to know why the amount that came out of my account higher than it was supposed to be
why is my bill so high?
can i get a copy of my billing history
can you send my account history
can you send my billing history
can you send my payment history
I need a copy of my billing history
i have a question about a different account
i have a question about a different policy
i want to change my account type
i want to talk about a different account
i want to talk about my policy
am i getting every discount that i can?
the price of my insurance keeps going up. is there any way you can help?
The price of my insurance keeps rising. are there any discounts?
i no longer see a discount
i received a letter saying you removed a discount from my policy
I think a discount was dropped from my policy
why was my auto pay discount removed from my policy?
why was my discount removed from my policy?
you guys took away one of my discounts
i'd like to know my due date for my bill
what date do i pay on?
what date is my payment due?
when do i need to send my money?
i got a late payment notice
i received a past due notice
I received a past due notice in the mail yesterday
I want to make a payment
i want to pay my bill
i would like to settle my balance
can you let me know if you got my payment
how much did i pay last
i'm checking if my payment has been processed
i don't think my bill is correct
why is my payment higher this month
have you sent out my refund check yet?
I'd like to check the status of my refund
when will I get my money back?
will I get a refund check?
will I get my money back?

description: Demonstration of a Billing Chat Bot

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Nothing more if there is no account

values: Alright, I'll send an email to {{email}} with the bill information when your net payment is due.
Alright, let me look into that for you. I see the last two payments we received were $123.24 on February 24, and $123.24 on February 23. Are these the payments you are referring to?

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Billing dispute double payment mock dialog
dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: Billing dispute too high mock dialog

values: Alright, let me look into that for you. I see the most recent payment we received was $187.23 on February 25th. Is this the payment you are talking about?

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Billing dispute too high mock dialog

values: Great, now help you find a list of discounts you current have so you can compare. Do you have a My Account set up?
I can also send a note to your agent and request that he or she contact you to go over discounts. Would you like me to do that?
If you mailed in or submitted a payment in the last couple days, it is possible we haven’t received or processed it yet. Have you mailed in or submitted a payment recently?

dialog_nodes.parent: Otherwise conditionally add to the response

values: I'm sorry. I couldn't find an account of that type. Would you like to continue to talk about your <? $currentAccount ?> account?

I’m sorry this information wasn’t helpful. If you would like additional information, or if you would like to request an adjustment on your billing account, I recommend contacting our Billing Care Center. I can have a representative call or email you if you would like.
I'm sorry. Would you like to speak with an agent?

dialog_nodes.parent: Billing dispute too high mock dialog

values: In order to get this resolved for you as quickly as possible, we need to get your agent involved. She can re-add the discounts and help you make sure everything is set up correctly. Is it ok if I send a note to your agent and have her contact you as soon as possible?

I see an automatic payment was scheduled on February 21. I also see that a partial payment was processed on your policy on February 22.  Since the automatic payment had already been scheduled, the change to your billing account did not impact the amount pulled. Your next scheduled payment will reflect the change to your billing account. 	Was this information helpful?

dialog_nodes.parent: Billing dispute too high mock dialog

values: Is there anything else that I can help you with?

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else

values: It looks like that last bill we sent you showed a payment of $167.34 due on March 28. Is this the bill you are referring to?
Let me know when you are ready to continue
Let me know when you’re ready to continue.
Not a problem. I'll redirect this conversation to a live agent!
Ok. We'll continue to talk about your <? $currentAccount ?>. How can I help you?
Sure. How else can I help you?

dialog_nodes.parent: Can I help you with anything else

values: Thanks. How can I help you with your <? entities.Product[0].value ?> insurance account
Thank you. How can I help you today?
These payments were made close together and within the same payment month. Would you like one of these payments refunded to you?

dialog_nodes.parent: Billing dispute double payment mock dialog

values: This is where I would connect to a back end system to indicate that the user would like to follow up on the conversation with an agent. This is not built in to the prototype.
This is where I would hand off the conversation to the transaction system. This integration is not part of the prototype, but this can built out from this point.

dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: Can I help you with anything else

values: Would you like me to email you when your next payment is due?

dialog_nodes.parent: Account current and payment is not scheduled

values: Would you like to make a payment?
Would you like to make a payment now?

This bill is different from your previous bill. I see that we sent you a notice on February 28th stating that a change was processed on your policy. This notice would contain the reason for the change. Would you like a representative to contact you about this change?

It looks like your policy recently renewed and your new premium changed at renewal. There can be many reasons for this change and it will take some time to research to provide you a complete answer. If its alright with you, I’d like to submit a request to one of our knowledgeable care center representatives to research and find you an answer. Would it be alright for one of our representatives to contact you?
Hello. I'm your AI billing agent. I can help you with questions about your bill. For instance, ask me when your bill is due.
Hi. I'm your AI billing agent. I can help you with questions about your bill. For instance, ask me when your bill is due.
Hey there. I'm your AI billing agent. I can help you with questions about your bill. For instance, ask me when your bill is due.
I'm not sure how to respond to that. Could you rephrase your statement?
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you rephrase your statement?
I apologize, but I was not able to understand your statement. Could you rephrase it?
Hmmm... I wasn't able to understand that statement. Could you rephrase it?
Alright, what date would you like the billing history to end? Please tell me the month/day/year.
May I ask for your last name?
Sure, I can help you with that. What date would you like the billing history to start? Please tell me the month/day/year.

dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: Account current and payment is not scheduled

values: Sure thing. Let me put in that request

go_to.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else
Can I help you with anything else
Can I help you with anything else
Can I help you with anything else
Can I help you with anything else
Can I help you with anything else
Can I help you with anything else

dialog_nodes.parent: Otherwise conditionally add to the response

go_to.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else

values: I’d be happy to assist with that. I will submit the refund request for $123.24 right away. One the request is processed, a check will be mailed to you for the refund amount. You can expect the check to arrive within 10 calendar days.

go_to.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else

values: I’d be happy to look into that for you. I see that we processed a refund on {{refundIssuedDate_<? $currentAccount ?>}} in the amount of {{refundIssuedAmount_<? $currentAccount ?>}}. A check has been printed and is being mailed to you at {{address}}. It can take up to 3-business days for the check to arrive in the mail.

go_to.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else

values: I'm sorry. I don't have a record of a late payment notice for your account.

go_to.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else

values: I'm sorry. I don't see a refund issued for your <? $currentAccount ?> account.

go_to.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else

values: Thanks. I'll send an email to {{email}} within 24 hours containing your billing history.

go_to.dialog_node: Can I help you with anything else

values: Thank you, I’ll make a note on your account to expect payment soon.

dialog_nodes.parent: Can I help you with anything else

values: I do show we recently sent you a policy change notice regarding a discount removal. I can certainly help get this resolved for you. Lets start by identifying the discount(s) removed and I can explain why this may have happened.

dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: Billing dispute double payment mock dialog

values: I see that the Paperless Discount was removed. This discount requires you to set up online billing and opt into paperless services. It’s possible not every step was completed, or our system didn’t recognize it.

I see the minimum amount of {{nextPaymentAmount_<?$currentAccount ?>}} is due by {{nextPaymentDate_<?$currentAccount ?>}} for your <?$currentAccount ?> account. The total balance of this account is {{totalBalance_<?$currentAccount ?>}} for the remainder of your policy period that runs through {{policyRenewalDate_<?$currentAccount ?>}}.

I see that you next due will be {{nextPaymentDate_<?$currentAccount ?>}}. Your next payment hasn’t been scheduled yet, so I’m not sure what the exact amount will be. You can expect your next payment to be scheduled on or around {{nextPaymentDate_<?$currentAccount ?>}}.

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Account current and payment is not scheduled

values: I see that the Auto Pay Discount was removed. This discount requires the setup of Automatic Payments from your checking or savings account. It’s possible this automatic payment was never set up, or our system didn’t recognize it.

dialog_nodes.parent: Billing dispute double payment mock dialog

values: I see that we did send a notice to you on {{pastDueNoticeDate_<? $currentAccount ?>}} that said we will need a payment in the amount of {{nextPaymentAmount_<?$currentAccount ?>}} by {{pastDuePaymentDate_<?$currentAccount ?>}} to maintain active coverage on your policy.

It looks like we have not received a payment for the last due date on {{nextPaymentDate_<?$currentAccount ?>}}. A late-payment notice was sent to you on {{pastDueNoticeDate_<? $currentAccount ?>}}. We will need a payment in the amount of {{nextPaymentAmount_<?$currentAccount ?>}} by {{pastDuePaymentDate_<?$currentAccount ?>}} to maintain active coverage on your policy.
I wasn't able to identify you. Could you please try again.

Alright, if you scroll down you should see an expandable menu that’s titled “Policy Discounts”. This will show you all the discounts we currently have for this policy. You can then compare this list to all the discounts we offer on the list we found previously.

Perfect! Go ahead and log into your My Account. Click on the Policies tab. On the left hand side of the screen you will see a list of all your policies. Click on the policy you want to view discounts for.
If there are discounts you don’t currently have that you are interested in, make a list. I recommend reaching out to your agent directly to request new discounts for your policy.

go_to.dialog_node: Nothing more if there is no account

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Otherwise conditionally add to the response
dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: Nothing more if there is no account

values: I’d be happy to help you locate all the information we have available about discounts. Lets start by showing where you can find a list of all discounts we offer. If you click https://www.ibm.com/watson/developercloud you will be directed to an updated list on our website.
I'm sorry, I couldn't find an account of that type. Could you try again?

dialog_nodes.dialog_node: Could not find that account type

dialog_nodes.parent: Otherwise conditionally add to the response

values: Good afternoon, and thank you for accessing the Watson Billing chat. about your  bill.
Good evening, and thank you for accessing the Watson Billing chat. about your  bill.
Good morning, and thank you for accessing the Watson Billing chat. about your  bill.
Hello {{firstName}}. I can see that you have accounts for {{accountList}} insurance. Which account can I help you with today?

dialog_nodes.previous_sibling: Could not find that account type

values: Hello {{firstName}}. I can see that you have an account for {{accountList}} insurance. How can I help you today?
I'm sorry, I can't switch accounts because I only see that you have an account for <? $currentAccount ?> insurance.
It looks like the last payment that we received for your <? $currentAccount ?> account was on {{lastPaymentDate_<? $currentAccount ?>}} in the amount of {{lastPaymentAmount_<? $currentAccount ?>}}.

It looks like the last payment that we received for your <?entities.Product[0].value ?> account was on {{lastPaymentDate_<?entities.Product[0].value ?>}} in the amount of {{lastPaymentAmount_<?entities.Product[0].value ?>}}.

So that I can help you with your question, I’d like to start by finding your information in our system.
Thank you giving me the opportunity to help you today. I’m here 24 hours a day 7 days a week whenever you need help with your billing account. Have a great day.
Thank you giving me the opportunity to help you today. I’m here 24 hours a day 7 days a week whenever you need help with your billing account. Have a great night.

values: Hey there, and thank you for accessing the Watson Billing chat. about your  bill.
Hi there, and thank you for accessing the Watson Billing chat. about your  bill.
Hello, and thank you for accessing the Watson Billing chat. about your  bill.
Thank you.
Thanks.
Got it.
Great!
OK
Just two more quick questions. Can you provide me with your current zip code?
Next, please enter your date of birth. For security purposes, the information will be masked in the chat window.
Thanks. Let me verify your account.
This is my last question. For your safety and security, can you confirm for me the last 4-digits of your SSN? For security purposes, the information will be masked in the chat window.
